SELECT emp_code empCode, team_code teamCode, rank_code rankCode, emp_kor_name korName FROM emp
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO edoc( edoc_title, edoc_type, edoc_writer, edoc_enroll_date ) VALUES( #{edocTitle}, #{edocType}, #{edocWriter}, NOW() )
INSERT INTO edoc_file( file_name, original_file_name, file_type, file_size, ) VALUES( #{fileName}, #{orginalFileName}, #{fileType}, #{fileSize} )
INSERT INTO edoc_draft( edoc_num, prop_start_date, prop_end_date, prop_content ) VALUES( #{edocNum}, #{propStartDate}, #{propEndDate}, #{propContent} )
mapper.select:
SELECT edoc.edoc_enroll_date edocEnrollDate, edoc.edoc_num edocNum, edoc.edoc_type edocType, edoc.edoc_status edocStatus, edoc.edoc_title edocTitle, etype.edoc_form_title edocFormTitle, edoc.file_name fileName, emp.emp_code writerEmpCode, emp.emp_kor_name korName FROM edoc JOIN emp ON edoc_writer = emp_code JOIN edoc_approval app ON app.edoc_num = edoc.edoc_num JOIN edoc_form_type etype ON edoc.edoc_type = etype.edoc_type WHERE app.approver = #{empCode}
AND edoc.edoc_done_date IS NULL AND edoc.edoc_status = '0'
AND edoc.edoc_done_date IS NULL AND edoc.edoc_status != '0'
AND app.appr_status != '0'
ORDER BY edoc.edoc_enroll_date DESC, edoc.edoc_num DESC
LIMIT #{startRow}, 10

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM edoc JOIN emp ON edoc_writer = emp_code JOIN edoc_approval app ON app.edoc_num = edoc.edoc_num JOIN edoc_form_type etype ON edoc.edoc_type = etype.edoc_type WHERE app.approver = #{empCode}
AND edoc.edoc_done_date IS NULL AND edoc.edoc_status = '0'
AND edoc.edoc_done_date IS NULL AND edoc.edoc_status != '0'
AND app.appr_status != '0'

SELECT edoc.edoc_enroll_date edocEnrollDate, edoc.edoc_num edocNum, edoc.edoc_status edocStatus, edoc.edoc_title edocTitle, edoc.edoc_type edocType, edoc.file_name edocFileName, etype.edoc_form_title edocFormTitle, edoc.file_name fileName, emp.emp_code writerEmpCode, emp.emp_kor_name edocWriter, team.team_name teamName, appr1.approver approver1, appr1.appr_order apprOrder1, appr1.appr_status apprStatus1, appr1.appr_reason apprReason1, appr1.appr_date apprDate1, appr2.approver approver2, appr2.appr_order apprOrder2, appr2.appr_status apprStatus2, appr2.appr_reason apprReason2, appr2.appr_date apprDate2 FROM edoc JOIN emp ON edoc_writer = emp_code JOIN team ON emp.team_code = team.team_code JOIN edoc_form_type etype ON edoc.edoc_type = etype.edoc_type JOIN edoc_approval appr1 ON edoc.edoc_num = appr1.edoc_num AND appr1.appr_order = '1' JOIN edoc_approval appr2 ON edoc.edoc_num = appr2.edoc_num AND appr2.appr_order = '2' WHERE edoc.edoc_num = #{edocNum} AND ( appr1.approver = #{empCode} OR appr2.approver = #{empCode} )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO edoc_vacation( edoc_num, vac_type, vac_start_date, vac_end_date, vac_reason ) VALUES( #{edocNum}, #{vacType}, #{vacStartDate}, #{vacEndDate}, #{vacReason} )
INSERT INTO edoc_event( edoc_num, event_type, event_date, event_place, event_expense ) VALUES( #{edocNum}, #{eventType}, #{eventDate}, #{eventPlace}, #{eventExpense} )
INSERT INTO edoc_report( edoc_num, report_type, report_content ) VALUES( #{edocNum}, #{reportType}, #{reportContent} )
mapper.update: UPDATE edoc_approval SET appr_reason = #{apprReason}, appr_status = #{apprStatus}, appr_date = NOW() WHERE edoc_num = #{edocNum} AND approver = #{empCode}

UPDATE edoc
edoc_status = #{request},
edoc_done_date = NOW(),
edoc_enroll_date = NOW()
WHERE edoc_num = #{edocNum}

SELECT edoc.edoc_num edocNum, edoc.edoc_title edocTitle, etype.edoc_form_title edocType, edoc.file_name edocFileName, edoc.edoc_done_date edocDoneDate, edoc.edoc_enroll_date edocEnrollDate, edoc.edoc_status edocStatus FROM edoc JOIN edoc_form_type etype ON edoc.edoc_type = etype.edoc_type WHERE edoc.edoc_writer = #{empCode}
AND( edoc.edoc_status = '1' OR edoc.edoc_status = '2' )
